titles.title: Congressional Death Benefit Elimination Act of 2015
To prohibit the payment of death gratuities to the surviving heirs of deceased Members of Congress.
Congressional Death Benefit Elimination Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Congressional Death Benefit Elimination Act of 2015
This bill declares that no payment of death gratuities may be made to surviving heirs of deceased Members of Congress from congressional accounts or any other appropriated funds.
